    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# sampling parameters\n",
    "n_warmup = 1000\n",
    "n_sampling = 3000\n",
    "n_chains = 2\n",
    "n_thin = 1\n",
    "\n",
    "# bayesian model, change default priors:\n",
    "drift_priors = {'mu_mu':1, 'sd_mu':1, 'mu_sd':0, 'sd_sd':1}\n",
    "threshold_priors = {'mu_mu':-1, 'sd_mu':.5, 'mu_sd':0, 'sd_sd':1}"
   ]
  },

      "\u001B[0;31mKeyboardInterrupt\u001B[0m: "
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "model_fit = model.fit(\n",
    "    data,\n",
    "    drift_priors=drift_priors,\n",
    "    threshold_priors=threshold_priors,\n",
    "    iter_warmup=n_warmup,\n",
    "    iter_sampling=n_sampling,\n",
    "    chains = n_chains)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%% md\n"
    }
   },
   "source": [
    "### get Rhat"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%%\n"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "model_fit.rhat.describe()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%% md\n"
    }
   },
   "source": [
    "### calculate wAIC"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%%\n"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "model_fit.waic"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%% md\n"
    }
   },
   "source": [
    "## Posteriors"
   ]

    "model_fit.plot_posteriors(height=5, show_intervals='HDI');"
   ]

   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%% md\n"
    }
   },
   "source": [
    "## Posterior predictives"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%% md\n"
    }
   },
   "source": [
    "### Ungrouped"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%%\n"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "pp_summary = model_fit.get_posterior_predictives_summary(n_posterior_predictives=100)\n",
    "pp_summary"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%%\n"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "model_fit.plot_mean_posterior_predictives(n_posterior_predictives=100, figsize=(20,8), show_intervals='HDI');"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%%\n"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "model_fit.plot_quantiles_posterior_predictives(n_posterior_predictives=100, kind='shades');"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%% md\n"
    }
   },
   "source": [
    "### Grouped"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%%\n"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import numpy as np"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%%\n"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# Define new grouping variables, in this case, for the different choice pairs, but any grouping var can do\n",
    "data['choice_pair'] = 'AB'\n",
    "data.loc[(data.cor_option == 3) & (data.inc_option == 1), 'choice_pair'] = 'AC'\n",
    "data.loc[(data.cor_option == 4) & (data.inc_option == 2), 'choice_pair'] = 'BD'\n",
    "data.loc[(data.cor_option == 4) & (data.inc_option == 3), 'choice_pair'] = 'CD'\n",
    "\n",
    "data['block_bins'] = pd.cut(data.trial_block, 8, labels=np.arange(1, 9))"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%%\n"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "model_fit.get_grouped_posterior_predictives_summary(\n",
    "                grouping_vars=['block_label', 'choice_pair'],\n",
    "                quantiles=[.3, .5, .7],\n",
    "                n_posterior_predictives=100)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%%\n"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "model_fit.get_grouped_posterior_predictives_summary(\n",
    "                grouping_vars=['block_bins'],\n",
    "                quantiles=[.3, .5, .7],\n",
    "                n_posterior_predictives=100)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%%\n"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "model_fit.plot_mean_grouped_posterior_predictives(grouping_vars=['block_bins'], \n",
    "                                                  n_posterior_predictives=100, \n",
    "                                                  figsize=(20,8));"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%%\n"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "model_fit.plot_quantiles_grouped_posterior_predictives(n_posterior_predictives=100,\n",
    "                                                        grouping_var='choice_pair',\n",
    "                                                        kind='shades',\n",
    "                                                        quantiles=[.1, .3, .5, .7, .9]);"
   ]
  }
